title: Oceania Tournaments (ALL AGES) ! -AMA-
body:
**Hey guys, WorstAnnie_ here.
I recently started hosting little Oceanic Tournaments for League of Legends going from high schools vs high schools etc.
Right now, we're planning to get Riot to sponsor our tournaments that we host with little RP prizes and what not, and we're looking for teams and players!
Basically, all you have to do is rack up a group of 5 friends or players and should there be any tournaments on that week, you can go ahead and sign yourself up through the private message page on Facebook.
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/OCETourney/
Tournament Rules apply and are simple; there will be more rules on the facebook page later on.
Currently, we need members to join & like the group as we are trying to expand so if you're at all interested in playing League of Legends competitively beyond ranked then come and join in! Win some RP with your mates and possibly skins.
Also any questions can also be posted below and I'll try my best to answer all of them!


Thanks,**

{{champion:1}}

replies.body:
Awesome idea! 

When the ULoL groups idea began I was a little disappointed because I'm not currently at Uni (or Highschool, haha) but I'm sure plenty of people would appreciate the chance to be apart of something that is more available - there being plenty more Highschool students than Uni ones and all.
